entry.title: [GRA1][Network] - Network equipment version upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 22, 02:00 - 02:30 UTC

Feb 17, 16:37 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 23/02/2023 02:00 UTC
End time : 23/02/2023 02:30 UTC
Service impact : All services will be unavailable for the duration of the maintenance on the following clusters:
cluster020.gra.hosting
cluster021.gra.hosting
cluster023.gra.hosting
cluster024.gra.hosting
cluster025.gra.hosting
cluster026.gra.hosting
cluster027.gra.hosting
cluster028.gra.hosting
cluster030.gra.hosting
cluster031.gra.hosting
Related Incident : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/6ndv4nwdy5jf
Service improvement : The maintenance follows the incident that impacted this network equipment. We will update the version of the network equipment to correct the bug that caused the equipment to reload.

entry.title: [CA][Collaborative solutions] - Hosted Exchange
entry.content:
Feb 16, 01:08 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 15/02/2023 18:30 UTC
End Time : 16/02/2023 00:45 UTC
Service impact : Customers Weren't receiving incoming mails. However, outgoing mails is functional
Root cause : An overflow of requests caused the non-reception incoming mails and putting them into the backlog. No mail was lost. All requests in the backlog were processed..
Current status : Resolved

Feb 16, 00:07 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 15/02/2023 18:30 UTC
Service impact : Customers can't receive incoming mails. However, outgoing mails is functional
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
